original_text: “At the time of the end the king of the South will engage him in battle, and the king of the North will storm out against him with chariots and cavalry and a great fleet of ships. He will invade many countries and sweep through them like a flood.
korean_text: 마지막 때에 남방 왕이 그와 힘을 겨룰 것이나 북방 왕이 병거와 마병과 많은 배로 회오리바람처럼 그에게로 마주 와서 그 여러 나라에 침공하여 물이 넘침 같이 지나갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: At the time of the end
the king of the South will engage him in battle
sentences.korean_translation: 남방 왕이 그와 싸우러 올 것이라

sentences.original_text: and the king of the North will storm out against him
sentences.korean_translation: 북방 왕이 그를 치려고 물결처럼 밀려오되

sentences.original_text: with chariots and cavalry and a great fleet of ships
and sweep through them like a flood
sentences.korean_translation: 물이 흘러가는 것 같이 그들을 휩쓸 것이라
